title: Living Flame Dye
summaries: Living Flame Dye is a Hardmode dye given to the player by the Dye Trader in exchange for Strange Plants. It can only be obtained after defeating a mechanical boss. Upon application, the dye will cause all items in the slot equipped to change colors to a fiery red, with a yellow-to-red rippling effect. Additionally, any items affected by this dye will flash upon taking damage.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC50 SC
